    AbstractInstances.concretetype — Function.
    concretetype(T::Type)

    Return a concrete mutable type with no fields which is a subtype of T. The mutability of the returned type ensures that instances of the type are unique.

    AbstractInstances.eval
    AbstractInstances.include
    AbstractInstances.oftype — Function.
    oftype(T::Type)

    Create a unique instance of type, concretetype(T).

    AbstractInstances.singleton — Function.
    singleton(T::Type)

    Create an instance of type, singletontype(T).

    AbstractInstances.singletontype — Function.
    singletontype(T::Type)

    Return a concrete immutable type with no fields which is a subtype of T. The immutability of the returned type ensures that instances of the type are singletons.
